title: Unable to access Firefox account
content: I need access to my other Firefox account. It's an account I have for work and it was created while I was a temp. I got hired on by the company and they disabled my old AD account and that is the email I used to create a Firefox sync account. I don't have access to that email account anymore so therefore cannot receive a verification email to log in. I would like to change the email on that account to my new address. I really need all those bookmarks. We support well over a hundred different services and such, and it would take weeks or months to build up these bookmarks again. I have the login info for that Firefox account.
creator: DukeStallion

title: Firefox 2FA will not accept 6-digit codes
content:
I have tried both Google Authenticator and Guardian for use with Mozilla 2FA. I have tried scanning the QR code on my PC multiple times on each authentication app and retrieving multiple codes each time, but all entries stated "incorrect 6 digit code" on my PC to enable 2FA. I am not sure how this is not working. Both authenticator apps identified my correct login email address associated with my Mozilla account so I know it must have something to do with whatever is happening on the back end at Mozilla for my account.

Also, I have read a few posts in the Mozilla support knowledgebase regarding this very same issue, but did not see any resolution. I would really like to have 2FA. Can someone please contact me about this?
creator: carlod

title: Virus in navegator
content: A Yahoo search engine, called Browser Default, took over my browser. Firefox have not been able to give me information or assistance on how to remove it.
creator: adiaz65

title: 2 tabs using 6 GB of RAM.
content:
I have two idle tabs (no videos or other active components) open and according to Task Manager on my PC, it says Firefox is using 6 GB of memory. Unfathomably high number.

The Firefox Process Manager says the GPU (whatever that is) is using 5 GB of memory.

I did all the usual quick fixes (Restart, update, restart PC, refresh, disable add ons, etc.)

Please help. Why is 2 tabs none of which is a video tab using 6 GB of memory?
creator: mjwu7185

title: firefox is storing my bank account number
content: Hi, when I log into my bank I give my account number and then a password. I have told firefox not to remember my password but it is remembering the bank account number which automatically pops up when I am on the banks log in page. How do I stop this? Also when I signed up for this firefox help it asked for an email address and all my email addresses poped up for me to chose from. I didn't like this either. Appreciate any help. If these features can't be turned off whats the last version I can use that won't do this? cheers Neil
creator: ihatespam666

title: I can no longer install extensions outside from github or any other 3rd party site. Getting "this add-on could not be downloaded because of a connection failure"
content:
^topic, I can no longer download any extension outside of the official firefox site.

I noticed yesterday when I created a new firefox profile that I couldn't download 3rd party extensions. This also affects my main profile and creating a new profile have the same issue. This is the error I'm getting: https://puu.sh/JqAIh/0854801832.png

I'm running Firefox Nighlty 108.0a1 (2022-11-01) (64-bit), windows 10 64bit professional OS.

Manually saving the plugin and drag and drop still works, but directly clicking download doesn't.

Any idea on how to fix this?
creator: xeratzy

title: Crashing
content: since the last redevelopment of Mozilla Firefox I am having trouble exiting both my private and non private browser. I want to uninstall Firefox and re install it to see if that gets rid of the gremlins.
creator: minette

title: Trying to open a normal firefox windows opens the private window for some reason
content: When i just try to open firefox it opens a private window thats not even in private mode and it won;t let me open a normal firefox window. This happened after the latest firefox nightly update.
creator: tristan.keating

title: How do I sort my bookmarks by date properly?
content: I have a lot of bookmarks, they use to be sorted by date, but now they are sorted randomly after I changed computers. If I click control shift O it brings up the bookmarks, now I know you can go under "views" then "sort", then "added", but that still does not sort it properly. I just recently bookmarked a random page, tagging with a name so I remember which one it is. Now if I do this correctly that new bookmark I made should either be on the bottom or the top of the page after I sort it. But that is not the case. It's just mixed in somewhere in the middle. I tried sorting a few different ways, but no luck. PLEASE HELP!
creator: stephanegli313

title: Remove or Disable In-Browser Setup UI
content: It's annoying, useless, hand-holdy, terribly slow, and never asked for by anyone.
creator: davidman238

title: Acesso a https://www.americanas.com.br
content: Não consigo acessar https://www.americanas.com.br sendo que já consegui certas vezes. Reinstalei firefox e não adiantou. Msg: Access Denied You don't have permission to access "http://www.americanas.com.br/" on this server. Reference #18.85d3cf17.1667435194.fc84466
